scripts.build: tsc && copyfiles -u 1 env/settings.json dist && npm run generateBuildVersion
scripts.build:prod: tsc && copyfiles -u 1 env/settings.prod.json dist && node -e "require('fs').rename('dist/settings.prod.json', 'dist/settings.json', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Configuration file successfully renamed!') })"  && npm run generateBuildVersion
scripts.build:release: npm run build:prod && npm run deploy
scripts.build:release:dev: npm run build && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.start: npm run build && cd dist && node main.js
